meanings.definition: A person who makes or works with beads.
meanings.sent1: The beaders created beautiful necklaces and bracelets.
meanings.sent2: She joined a group of beaders to learn new beading techniques.
meanings.sent3: The beaders had a competition to see who could make the longest beaded necklace.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers moved like skilled beaders, threading the tiny beads effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The beaders' hands were stained with the vibrant colors of the beads they worked with.

meanings.sent1: The beaders in the shop were busy sorting through the different types of beads.
meanings.sent2: I met a group of talented beaders at the craft fair.
meanings.sent3: The beaders gathered around the table, each with their own unique bead collection.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the chatter of the beaders as they shared their latest creations.
meanings.sent5: The beaders' creations adorned the shelves, showcasing their creativity and skill.
